dev.failsafe

Class RetryPolicyConfig<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.failsafe.PolicyConfig<R>
      • dev.failsafe.FailurePolicyConfig<R>
        • dev.failsafe.DelayablePolicyConfig<R>
          • dev.failsafe.RetryPolicyConfig<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - result type

    public class RetryPolicyConfig<R>
extends DelayablePolicyConfig<R>
    Configuration for a RetryPolicy.

    This class is threadsafe.

    See Also:
    RetryPolicyBuilder

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowsRetries()
      Returns whether the policy config allows retries according to the configured maxRetries and maxDuration.
      List<CheckedBiPredicate<R,Throwable>> getAbortConditions()
      Returns the conditions for which an execution result or exception will cause retries to be aborted.

      Returns the delay between retries.

      Returns the max delay between backoff retries.

      • getMaxAttempts

        public int getMaxAttempts()
        Returns the max number of execution attempts to perform. A value of -1 represents no limit. Defaults to 3.
        See Also:
        RetryPolicyBuilder.withMaxAttempts(int), getMaxRetries()

      • getMaxDelay

        public Duration getMaxDelay()
        Returns the max delay between backoff retries.
        See Also:

      • getMaxDuration

        public Duration getMaxDuration()
        Returns the max duration to perform retries for.
        See Also:
        RetryPolicyBuilder.withMaxDuration(Duration)

      • getMaxRetries

        public int getMaxRetries()
        Returns the max number of retries to perform when an execution attempt fails. A value of -1 represents no limit. Defaults to 2.
        See Also:
        RetryPolicyBuilder.withMaxRetries(int), getMaxAttempts()
